name: strong
category_path: 33 Gloves LP Pro Short Cuff Youth Batting Gloves: YLS-1032
features: Fit: Designed for hitters, offering exceptional protection & a custom fit with contoured cuts
Leather: Soft, non-slip 0.9mm Cabretta leather with a velvet finish for ultimate comfort
Palm: Single-layer, one-piece palm with reverse-stitched fingers for better bat feel
Hot-Spot Overlays: Reinforced heel & thumb for extra protection
Stretch Panels: Super stretch panels ensure full range of motion & comfort
Friction Zones: Enhanced coverage for comfort & longer glove life
Cuff: Neoprene cuff for support & a secure fit
Closure: Easy-adjust TPR cuff with anti-snag Velcro for comfort & security
Fourchettes: Breathable, stretch fabric for a better fit & comfort
Finger Shape: Tapered design to match hand contours, reducing irritation
Thread: Durable, high-tensile strength thread for longevity
